name: System Improvements in LTE RAN L19.Q3
node_type: DU Radio Node, Baseband Radio Node
summary: TCP Optimization feature provides low queuing delay with high link utilization and also

parameters.name: QciProfilePredefined.pdb
parameters.type: The contribution from eNodeB to the Packet Delay Budget (PDB) for                                     a QCI. Packet delays outside eNodeB, for example in the                                     transport network, are excluded. For more information about PDB,                                     see 3GPP TS 23.203: Policy and charging                                         control architecture.

parameters.name: QciProfileOperatorDefined.pdb
parameters.type: The contribution from eNodeB to the Packet Delay Budget (PDB) for                                     a QCI. Packet delays outside eNodeB, for example in the                                     transport network, are excluded. For more information about PDB,                                     see 3GPP TS 23.203: Policy and charging                                         control architecture.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PER_UE_RB_TRAFFIC_REP
parameters.description: Total number of packets (PDCP SDUs) for which no part has been                                     transmitted over the air in the downlink direction and are                                     discarded due to AQM.

events.name: INTERNAL_PER_UE_RB_TRAFFIC_REP
events.description: Total number of packets (PDCP SDUs) for which no part has been                                     transmitted over the air in the downlink direction and are                                     discarded due to AQM.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011050 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011050 MO instance.
